  updateAssessment: String

  videosByGroup: String
}

  currentSchoolId: ID
  state: String
  subject: String
}

  curriculumArea: String
  gradeOrCourse: String

  schoolId: ID
}

  _id: ID
  accesses: [String]
  mainTeacher: Boolean

  state: String
}

  config: String
  items: [ID]
}

  isSameQuestionNumber: Boolean

}
